messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] thanx sandra
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/17/02 2:10:37 PM, ben2edge@yahoo.com writes:  I love when that happens!! I like seeing the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/17/02 2:10:37 PM, ben2edge@... writes:

<< Gee, a light bulb moment indeed!!! LOL >>

I love when that happens!!
I like seeing the light come on in my kids, and in ME!

You're surely welcome for any time I contributed raw materials for you to use
to get one of those moments yourself!

Sandra

messages.subject: thanx sandra
messages.msgSnippet: for the reply. You are right on the $$ as to helping the kids if,or when asked. That s pretty much what I ve been doing lately,(really, all of their lives)
messages.messageBody:
for the reply. You are right on the $$ as to helping the kids if,or
when asked.
That's pretty much what I've been doing lately,(really, all of their
lives) just couldn't see past everyones opinions, and definitions.
What's clicked for me is this, learning is all the time, not to be
put on some sort of a "school" calendar.
Guess I've always known it to be true, just took me a while.
Gee, a light bulb moment indeed!!! LOL
bte
